{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = AP150W.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Enterprise-grade Indoor Wallplate Dual-Radio Access Point, SD-WAN Router, and Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.extremenetworks.com/product/ap150w/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Aerohive |model = HiveAP 150W |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1600 |series = HiveAP |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = WBV-AP150W |icid = 7774A-AP150W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47452; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 900<!-- 900 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G200TFV00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Winbond;W632GG6KB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 7C:95:B1 |oui = 7C:95:B1
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.12; |stockos = Linux;3.16.36;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J18
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = PoE in/out, TPM, Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE) |addchip = SimpleLink Multistandard Wireless MCU;TI;CC2650;;1;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, SPI Interface Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3205;;1;,,, 5GHz 802.11ac WLAN Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-11;;3;,,, 0.5-6GHz SPDT Switch 50Î© Terminated;Skyworks;SKY13370-347LF;;2;,,, 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device 1P PSE Manager;Microsemi;PD69101;;1;,,, Low Power/Voltage Dual Comparator;Advanced Analog Circuits;AS393;;1;,,, 2A Dual Channel Synchro Step-Down Switcher w/ FET;TI;TPS54294;;1;,,, 3V-5.5V Dual Channel RS232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;SN65C3232E;;1;,,, 3-6V 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54618;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;1;,,, USB to Serial Port Controller;TI;TUSB3410I;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/28/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAMG8CNZ6631 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43525; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM47452 ARM (Cortex-A7) @900MHz (WiSoC) *Flash: ''[[Spansion]]'' S34ML04G200TFV000 (512MB) Parallel NAND *RAM: ''[[Winbond]]'' W632GG6KB-12 (256MB) DDR3 *Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM47452 (WiSoC) 2x2/1+1 (2.4/5GHz) :[[Broadcom]] BCM43525 3x3:3 (2.4/5GHz) *Ethernet: [[Broadcom]] BCM53134 *TPM: [[Atmel]] SC3205T
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Aerohive HiveAP 150W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Aerohive HiveAP 150W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
